entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Churchill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -26.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Churchill Airport 01:42 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -26.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -29.5°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 overnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023
